<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_852034_wfh.WFH Calendar converter</api_name><description>Make the WFH request calendar friendly? I dunno whats happenign lol</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>WFH Calendar converter</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "data",
  "label": "data",
  "description": "Planned Task GraphQL Data Result",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "json",
  "valueType": "object",
  "mandatory": true
}
]</props><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "Planned Task GraphQL Data Result",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "data",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	var returnArray = [];
	var records = input.data;
	
	for (var i in records){
		var myObj = {};
		myObj.title = records[i]._row_data.displayValue;
		myObj.id = records[i]._row_data.uniqueValue;
		myObj.description = records[i].u_state.displayValue;
		myObj.group = records[i].u_user.displayVaule;
		
		var startUTC = new GlideDateTime(records[i].u_start_date.value);
		myObj.start = startUTC.getNumericValue();
		
		var endUTC = new GlideDateTime(records[i].u_end_date.value);
		myObj.end = endUTC.getNumericValue();

		returnArray.push(myObj);
	}
	
	return returnArray;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-17 08:09:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>a8545c701bf4d9106a08a9b4bd4bcb35</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>WFH Calendar converter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_a8545c701bf4d9106a08a9b4bd4bcb35</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-17 08:22:53</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a8545c701bf4d9106a08a9b4bd4bcb35"/></record_update>
